import sys
t = int(input())
while t>0:
    a = sys.stdin.readline()
    b = sys.stdin.readline()
    if len(a)!=len(b):
        print ("0")
    else:
        x=0
        while x!=len(a):
            check=1
            y=0
            while y!=len(b):
                if a[x]==b[y]:
                    b=b[:y]+"a"+b[y+1:]
                    check=0
                    break
                y+=1
            if check==1:
                print ("0")
                break
            x+=1
        if check==0:
            print ("1")
    t-=1
